column1: Smoque BBQ////Does Smoque even need reviews at this point?  We all know this place is amazing
column2: and some of the best BBQ in town.  The seating can be limited
column3: but the food is worth any wait (and they rarely have a long wait because these servers get it done).  Try everything
column4: and thank me (and all the other 5 star reviewers) later.  I used them for my fiance's surprise birthday party 3 years ago
column5: and I still hear about the amazing brisket.  Get yourself some smoque!
